- No other row in the table has an "1st leg" score of "1 - 2."

Since Row 30 is the only entry that satisfies all parts of the claim, it is fully supported by this single instance.

- **Row 24** and further rows are irrelevant as they pertain to years beyond 2003 or different competitions.
